I was diagnosed with a rare, terminal cancer and the doctors have given me 8 months. I'm so glad I was able to play this masterpiece before I go. I know many people will probably not see this; but I highly recommend you play this game if you do see it. The pacing, visuals, everything is masterfully crafted. Thank you Valve for giving me this.
